title: Weather Forecast
description: Listen to a weather forecast and understand predictions.

audio.text:
Good morning! Here's your weather forecast for the week.

Today, Monday, will be sunny with temperatures around 22 degrees Celsius. It's the best day for outdoor activities this week, so enjoy the sunshine!

Tomorrow, Tuesday, clouds will move in during the afternoon. Temperatures will drop to about 18 degrees. It might rain in the evening, so don't forget your umbrella.

Wednesday and Thursday will be rainy. We're expecting heavy showers, especially on Wednesday morning. The temperature will stay around 15 degrees.

Friday looks better. The rain will stop, but it will still be cloudy. Expect temperatures of about 17 degrees.

The weekend forecast is good news! Saturday will be partly cloudy with sunshine in the afternoon. Sunday will be the warmest day of the week with temperatures reaching 24 degrees. Perfect weather for a trip to the park!

That's all for today's forecast. Have a great week!
